Uses of Package
org.eclipse.keypop.reader

Packages that use org.eclipse.keypop.reader
Package
Description
org.eclipse.keypop.reader
Components used in applications to manage readers and their observation.
org.eclipse.keypop.reader.selection
Components used to manage card selection.
org.eclipse.keypop.reader.spi
Components to be implemented by end user applications when readers are observed.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.keypop.reader used by org.eclipse.keypop.reader
    Class
    Description
    CardReader
    Card reader driving the underlying hardware to manage the card detection.
    CardReaderEvent.Type
    Possible card events.
    ObservableCardReader.DetectionMode
    Card detection management options to be applied after processing a card.
    ObservableCardReader.NotificationMode
    The options that apply when a card is detected.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.keypop.reader used by org.eclipse.keypop.reader.selection
    Class
    Description
    CardReader
    Card reader driving the underlying hardware to manage the card detection.
    ObservableCardReader
    Card reader able to observe the insertion/removal of cards.
    ObservableCardReader.NotificationMode
    The options that apply when a card is detected.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.keypop.reader used by org.eclipse.keypop.reader.spi
    Class
    Description
    CardReaderEvent
    Card event data container indicating a change of state.
